Does anyone know when is the senior Russian GPF? The junior GPF was two weeks ago, but there doesn't seem to be any info about the senior GPF.

niks

Joined

#115

Does anyone know when is the senior Russian GPF? The junior GPF was two weeks ago, but there doesn't seem to be any info about the senior GPF.

It has already happen. It was called Spartakiad this year. You can find the information in this thread, replays should still be available I think:

https://www.goldenskate.com/forum/threads/2023-24-spartakiad.97294/
